GSD.product_version: versions from v3.8 to before v5.16.19
GSD.description:
pinctrl: samsung: drop pin banks references on error paths

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 04ea05612ef74896ee3371d4ebe2c3747384d5f0, it was introduced in version v3.8 by commit ab663789d69760d2735402f66501f20b60312a3d. For more details please see the references link.
